channel.title: How come i get this everytime i run a 614 server?!?!?
channel.description:
[b]How come on every 614 i run i get this error ??[/b]
[RS2Server] Loading Cache... java.lang.NullPointerException at org.dementhium.cache.Cache.<init>(Cache.java:61) at org.dementhium.cache.Cache.<clinit>(Cache.java:23) at org.dementhium.RS2Server.main(RS2Server.java:21) [RS2Server] Loading World... [PacketManager] Loading packet handlers... [PacketManager] Loaded 43 packet handlers. [ClanManager] Loading clans.... [ClanManager] Loaded 0 clans. [AreaManager] Loading areas... [AreaManager] Loaded 4 areas. [NPCDropLoader] Loading drops... [NPCDropLoader] Loaded 7 drops [MagicHandler] Loading spells... [MagicHandler] Loaded 46 spells. [ItemDefinition] Loading item definitions... [ItemDefinition] Loaded 20175 item definitions. [NPCDefinition] Loading npc definitions... [NPCDefinition] Loaded 6 npc definitions. [NPCLoader] Loading default npc spawns... [NPCLoader] Loaded 17 default npc spawns. [ShopManager] Loaded Shops [RS2Server] Binding server... Exception in thread "main" org.jboss.netty.channel.ChannelException: Failed to b ind to: 0.0.0.0/0.0.0.0:43594 at org.jboss.netty.bootstrap.ServerBootstrap.bind(ServerBootstrap.java:3 06) at org.dementhium.net.ChannelBinder.bind(ChannelBinder.java:22) at org.dementhium.RS2Server.main(RS2Server.java:29) Caused by: java.net.BindException: Address already in use: bind at sun.nio.ch.Net.bind(Native Method) at sun.nio.ch.ServerSocketChannelImpl.bind(Unknown Source) at sun.nio.ch.ServerSocketAdaptor.bind(Unknown Source) at org.jboss.netty.channel.socket.nio.NioServerSocketPipelineSink.bind(N ioServerSocketPipelineSink.java:148) at org.jboss.netty.channel.socket.nio.NioServerSocketPipelineSink.handle ServerSocket(NioServerSocketPipelineSink.java:100) at org.jboss.netty.channel.socket.nio.NioServerSocketPipelineSink.eventS unk(NioServerSocketPipelineSink.java:74) at org.jboss.netty.channel.Channels.bind(Channels.java:468) at org.jboss.netty.channel.AbstractChannel.bind(AbstractChannel.java:170 ) at org.jboss.netty.bootstrap.ServerBootstrap$Binder.channelOpen(ServerBo otstrap.java:351) at org.jboss.netty.channel.Channels.fireChannelOpen(Channels.java:176) at org.jboss.netty.channel.socket.nio.NioServerSocketChannel.<init>(NioS erverSocketChannel.java:85) at org.jboss.netty.channel.socket.nio.NioServerSocketChannelFactory.newC hannel(NioServerSocketChannelFactory.java:142) at org.jboss.netty.channel.socket.nio.NioServerSocketChannelFactory.newC hannel(NioServerSocketChannelFactory.java:90) at org.jboss.netty.bootstrap.ServerBootstrap.bind(ServerBootstrap.java:2 85) ... 2 more

item.title: How come i get this everytime i run a 614 server?!?!?
item.dc:creator: @thesickpuma3 thesickpuma3
item.description:
@thesickpuma3 wrote:

Exception in thread “main” org.jboss.netty.channel.ChannelException: Failed to b
ind to: 0.0.0.0/0.0.0.0:43594

is it bcuz ur trying to run on the ip 0.0.0.0? probably. try replacing those with ur server ip

Read full topic
